transition module¶

Transition module¶

Used to handle FSM transitions

class transition.Transition(init_state, output_state, trigger_input, output, counter=1)[source]¶

Bases: object

Transition. Class used to create transition objects

A transition object is caracterized by the initial and final state and the input that caused the transition, plus the output.

It represent the edge of an FSM graph

__init__(init_state, output_state, trigger_input, output, counter=1)[source]¶

__init__.

Parameters

  • init_state – initial state where the transition start

  • output_state – Output state of the transition

  • trigger_input – Input that caused the transition

  • output – output shared by the node during the transition

  • counter – Number of times the transition happened

BGPFSM
